Video Integration Test Page

Test Categories:

  • ✅ Plate Tectonics Videos
  • ✅ Probability Videos
  • ✅ Author's Purpose Videos
  • ✅ Treaty of Waitangi Videos

Test Features:

  • 📱 Responsive Design
  • 🎯 Accessibility Features
  • 🖨️ Print-Friendly (videos hidden)
  • 📺 YouTube Privacy Mode
  • 📚 Curriculum Alignment

Test Instructions:

  1. Open the enhanced handouts in a web browser
  2. Scroll down to see the "Educational Videos" section
  3. Test video playback by clicking play on any video
  4. Try the print function - videos should be hidden
  5. Test on mobile devices for responsiveness
  6. Verify captions are available (CC button)

Enhanced Handouts:

🌍 Plate Tectonics Handout
🎲 Probability Handout
✍️ Author's Purpose Handout
📜 Treaty of Waitangi Handout

Testing Checklist:

Functionality:

  • □ Videos load properly
  • □ Play/pause controls work
  • □ Captions are available
  • □ Fullscreen mode works
  • □ Privacy mode enabled

Design:

  • □ Responsive on mobile
  • □ Videos hidden when printing
  • □ Proper spacing and layout
  • □ Difficulty badges visible
  • □ Learning objectives clear

🧺 Te Kete Ako

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

Quality teaching resources for Aotearoa New Zealand educators, honoring mātauranga Māori and contemporary pedagogy.
